main event: A bright, metallic-colored object was observed by ground observers and tracked on radar, displaying erratic flight characteristics.
interesting points: The object was tracked by radar for approximately 20-30 minutes, which strongly suggests an unidentified object.
The radar operator confirmed the presence of the object and its erratic flight characteristics.
The object changed color from blue to amber during the sighting.
The object moved at high speeds, up to 6-10 mph, and made sudden stops and right-angle turns.
The object did not have any visible tail, trail, or exhaust, and made no sound.
